name: Deep in the sea
description:
Deep in the sea - by Lexa555

In this game you will play as small crab which is trying to survive. You need to eat worms and avoid bigger crabs. They are trying to kill you! Show 'em you are the stronger one!

Gameplay

You can pick from 4 different difficulties: Easy, Normal, Hard and impossible.

use WSAD and MOUSE to move and look around. LMB to eat worms.

Contact: lexa555games@gmail.com
